channel.title: Apparmor profile for tbb without Whonix
channel.description: Is this your profile (https://github.com/Whonix/apparmor-profile-torbrowser/blob/master/etc/apparmor.d/home.*.tor-browser_*.Browser.firefox)? I want it to be applied to my own system which is kubuntu, how do I modify the profile? The absolute path there is not matched, and many other components should be modified I think.

item.title: Apparmor profile for tbb without Whonix
item.dc:creator: aawithout
item.description:
Is this your profile (https://github.com/Whonix/apparmor-profile-torbrowser/blob/master/etc/apparmor.d/home..tor-browser_.Browser.firefox)? I want it to be applied to my own system which is kubuntu, how do I modify the profile? The absolute path there is not matched, and many other components should be modified I think.
